name: 2023 A novel approach to the design of a 3D-printed soft robotic gripper
description: 2023 This paper presents a novel approach to the design of a 3D-printed soft robotic gripper that can be used for various applications.

name: 2021 A study on the effects of soft robotics on human-robot interaction
description: This study investigates the effects of soft robotics on human-robot interaction and how it can improve user experience.
